mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PWCHK, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_POST, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_IMGNAME, MEMBER_IMGPATH, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_WITHDRAWAL, MEMBER_SNS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND MEMBER_PW = #{member_pw}

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PWCHK, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_POST, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_IMGNAME, MEMBER_IMGPATH, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_WITHDRAWAL, MEMBER_SNS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_SNS = #{member_sns}
